summary:
### Monthly Operating Report Summary (May 2025)  

**Retail Business:**  
- Mass market electricity & gas sales: **365GWh** (vs. 413GWh in May 2024).  
- Mass market netback: **$145.13/MWh** (vs. $130.41/MWh in May 2024).  

**Wholesale Business:**  
- Contracted electricity sales: **768GWh** (vs. 778GWh in May 2024).  
- Electricity & steam net revenue: **$169.49/MWh** (vs. $163.31/MWh in May 2024).  
- Unit generation cost (incl. acquired): **$49.26/MWh** (vs. $61.80/MWh in May 2024).  

**Project Updates:**  
- Te Huka 3 progress: **99.7%** (vs. 100% target).  
- BESS progress: **70%** (vs. 79% target).  

**Market Data:**  
- Otahuhu futures settlement price (Q3 2025): **$182.25/MWh** (down from $199/MWh on 30 May 2025).  
- South Island hydro storage: **87% of mean**; North Island: **139% of mean**.  
- Clutha scheme storage: **79% of mean** (inflows at 100% of mean for May).  

**Operational Highlights:**  
- Total customer connections: **641,000** (vs. 611,000 in May 2024).  
- Spot electricity purchases: **473GWh** (vs. 494GWh in May 2024).  
- GHG emissions from generation: **271kt CO2-e** (vs. 234kt in Q3 FY24).  

**Key Financials:**  
- Realized gains on market derivatives: **$0.64m** (vs. $0.55m in May 2024).  

No material capital markets or liquidity impacts identified.
